title: Add option to Block queueing with Premades for us Solo mates (we don't mind longer queues)
body:
Waste of time it seems if I play solo queue anymore.  This would be for any type of queue, nice option Checkbox so I don't waste my time against 2-5 people huddled in a Ventrillo or Skype session using third party resources I don't have access too.  

My account is so old I also notice I may win several games in a row, and then suddenly get matched with teammates who play like they just got their accounts from a friend.  Decided to post on this because I think Match maker is using my account as a "keystone" on a team of lesser skilled to somehow balance it out against an enemy team with a premade mixed into it.   

As of late when I notice the enemy team has several people sporting same clan tags, Ill just wiggle my mouse and afk/hangout near respawn.  I may actually owe Riot a thank you, because I actually got a downstairs sink project done that'd been lingering for weeks.  :)

replies.body: 2-5 people? In Soloque?  Pretty sure its 2 max.

In my previous game in Match History I was Fiddlesticks, opponents  were

I'm not familiar enough with the Summoner Profile tag stuff to see which of the 3 belonged to CBG, but its certainly more than 2.  And 3 people in skype can get a lot done over a team of people not using voice comms.

Seeing as how Riot makes navigating summoner profile info difficult, its not surprising an option to filter queue preferences hasn't been added yet.

The only reason they might've possibly somehow been able to get in game together would be if they started queues at the same time. 

Solo duo does not have the ability to consistently put 3-5 friends together.

You might've been in flex by mistake
